divs: sighting detailscommenting on report of the bright light at mid-day at what looked like a solar\geothermal facility near daggett, ca. i suspect you saw the solar two facility, a joint project of the department of energy and a consortium of utilities that i worked on for a number of years. the 2,000 mirrors surrounding the 300-foot tower are controlled by computer to focus on a fluid-filled container near the top of the tower. before focusing the light directly onto the tower, the mirrors are usually aligned to focus on a spot (or two) away from the tower and then are brought to bear directly on it. the effect is strange, i know, and the heat is intense, enough to fry bugs passing through the beam instantly. i suppose you could've seen something else, but your description sounds to me like that project.
